meanings.def: an alcoholic drink made from plants or fruits other than grapes
examples: elderberry/rice wine

meanings.def: to go to restaurants, etc. and enjoy good food and drink; to entertain somebody by buying them good food and drink
examples: The town offers many opportunities for wining and dining.
The firm spent thousands wining and dining potential clients.
